title: Hearing Set For Army Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl After Desertion Charges Filed
teaser: The Army has charged Bergdahl with desertion and misbehavior before the enemy. Bergdahl disappeared from his unit in Afghanistan in 2009 and end up being held captive by the Taliban for five years.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
